description.brief: Build recipe to install code sourcery's g++ lite toolchain for arm-gnueabi

package.description: Installer script for code sourcery's g++ lite arm-none-linux-gnueabi toolchain. As this downloads a binary version of the toolchain, it only works on x86. To work for amd64, need to automate a download and compile of the toolchain's source. for 64 bit machines.
package.author: Daniel Stonier (d.stonier@gmail.com)
